attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2003-1210

Date: 2003-08-13

                     Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister for International Trade, pursuant to subsection 21(6) of the Northern Pipeline Act, hereby approves the amendment to the shareholders agreement originally entered into by Westcoast Transmission Company Limited, Alberta Gas Trunk Line Company Limited and Foothills Pipe Lines (Yukon) Ltd., dated August 4, 1977, as set out in the annexed document entitled “Joinder and Seventh Amending Agreement to Foothills Shareholders Agreement” and dated June 6, 2003.

 


                     Sur recommandation du ministre du Commerce international et en vertu du paragraphe 21(6) de la Loi sur le pipe-line du Nord, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil approuve les modifications à l’accord entre les actionnaires initialement conclu le 4 août 1977 entre la Westcoast Transmission Company Limited, l’Alberta Gas Trunk Line Company Limited et la Foothills Pipe Lines (Yukon) Ltd., tel qu’il est indiqué dans le document intitulé Joinder and Seventh Amending Agreement to Foothills Shareholders Agreement, en date du 6 juin 2003, ci-après.
attachmentText: PC Number: 2003-1210Date: 2003-08-13                        Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister for International Trade, pursuant to subsection 21(6) of the Northern Pipeline Act, hereby approves the amendment to the shareholders agreement originally entered into by Westcoast Transmission Company Limited, Alberta Gas Trunk Line Company Limited and Foothills Pipe Lines (Yukon) Ltd., dated August 4, 1977, as set out in the annexed document entitled “Joinder and Seventh Amending Agreement to Foothills Shareholders Agreement” and dated June 6, 2003.                         Sur recommandation du ministre du Commerce international et en vertu du paragraphe 21(6) de la Loi sur le pipe-line du Nord, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil approuve les modifications à l’accord entre les actionnaires initialement conclu le 4 août 1977 entre la Westcoast Transmission Company Limited, l’Alberta Gas Trunk Line Company Limited et la Foothills Pipe Lines (Yukon) Ltd., tel qu’il est indiqué dans le document intitulé Joinder and Seventh Amending Agreement to Foothills Shareholders Agreement, en date du 6 juin 2003, ci-après.
